```{r}
#| output: asis
#| echo: false
ppl <- readRDS("websitedata.RData")
ppl <- ppl[ppl$category == "People", , drop = FALSE]
if(nrow(ppl) > 0){
  cat('::: {layout="[20,-2,20]" layout-valign="center"}\n',
    glue::glue("\n\n# [{ppl$title}]({ppl$link})\n\n![]({ppl$picture})\n\n{ppl$description}\n\n"),
    "\n",
    ":::", "",
    sep = ""
)
}
```
